title: Common traits of successful blue ocean strategies
description: Great strategies have a clear focus, diverge from competition, and are easy to explain.
html:
There are three traits that appear consistently across successful blue ocean strategies:

  1. Focus
  2. Divergence
  3. A compelling tagline

Companies that put an emphasis on a small number of key Factors of competition exhibit focus. This is an indicator of a successful Blue ocean strategy.

When the Factors of competition emphasized by a company are not the industry norms, it shows divergence. Divergence is a hallmark of successful Blue ocean strategies.

Companies that exhibit focus and divergence in their strategy need to convey their Value innovation to customers. Those with successful Blue ocean strategies often accomplish this using a compelling tagline. The tagline is a short quip that accomplishes a subset of what a positioning statement does.

Business strategies that exhibit those three traits are more likely to be headed for Blue oceans.
